name: Medium Beeswax Bowl
description:
These are beautiful bowls that are created using only 100% local beeswax and natural plants and flowers. These bowls can be used to hold potpourri or to hold a tealight candle. When a candle is placed inside of the bowl it provides a beautiful glowing effect that highlights the imprinted flowers and leaves. 
Prices are according to the size of the bowl. These bowls range from large, medium and small. Please click on the appropriate product title for the size that you prefer. 

We would be happy to custom make a bowl for your home decor. Please email us with any requests for bowls using certain flowers, leaves or colors!!

**Please always use caution when leaving any candles burning inside the bowls. Always place candles on a base or use foil wrapped tealights. Never leave burning candles unattended. Melting of the bowls can occure in extream heat.

name: Champaka Soap Bar - Grandma Sandy's Favorite!
description:
This bar has sweet, earthy and rich floral notes that make this a real treat. Grandma Sandy says it is the best one yet!
Champaka is a large evergreen tree native to South Asia. It is best known for is strongly frangrant yellow flowers. 

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil,  Sunflower Oil,  Shea Butter,  Fragrance, Annatto Powder, Black Walnut Powder.

name: Large 100% Beeswax Candle
description:
This is a heavy duty beautiful candle made with only 100% local beeswax and a cotton wick. This candle has not been scented due to the wonder aroma the natural beeswax provides. Make sure to place this candle on a sturdy base before using and as usual use caution and never leave a candle unattended. 

We also have smaller votives priced at only $3.00 each. They will be posted soon!!

name: Bay Rum - Large - Buy 4 get one Free - Free Shipping!
description:
Bay Rum provides a classic aroma of Bay Essential Oil with a touch of Orange and Cinnamon for that spice scent that both men and women can enjoy! Don't forget to add promo code "Buy4get1free" at check out for a free 4oz bar,  enter quantity of "5" to receive $5.00 off at checkout.



Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil,  Sunflower Oil,  Shea Butter,  Bay Essential Oil, Orange Essential Oil, Cinnamon Essential Oil, Rosehip Powder, Annatto Powder.
